channel.title: ~-`~Ruinous~'-~ 24\7 VPS HOSTED | TORVA AND CHAOTICS | DICING[Delete other thrd]
channel.description:
Hello fellow Mopar users! Come visit us at http://ruinousrs.com/
Come step into the world of Ruinous! Here you can play with others users. You can do almost anything you'd like! From PK'ing, to Skilling, Dicing, and even PvM'ing. Nearly everything works, we have a dedicated staff team working around the clock to get you the best content we can deliver. Also, we are a proudly VPS-Hosted Server so we have 24\7 Uptime.
Come visit us at http://ruinousrs.com/
Here are some screenshots: MOPAR MODS -- PLEASE DELETE MY OTHER THREAD AND KEEP THIS ONE UP :) THANK YOU Home: [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/bgw9jk.png[/img]
Dicing W/ CC functionality: [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/2a572t.png[/img]
AGS special attack w/ animation: [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/e81yyu.png[/img]
We also have many other things, just no time to add more pictures! Hope to see you online soon!
Come visit us at http://ruinousrs.com/
Join today! - Mod Sam
